topic.title: Conference Style
topic.section:
A desired style can be applied to the conference. A particular theme can be selected from the dropdown menu next to Conference Theme. A variety of themes is also available in Theme Gallary on Public Knowledge Project website to be downloaded. A particular Conference Style sheet can be uploaded as well.

Additionally, the interface can be customized by moving blocks of information for different displays: (a) display or not; (b) the position to display - on left sidebar or on right sidebar, moved with left-right arrows; (c)the position on the sidebar - in any order, moved with up-down arrows. Those chosen as unselected will be hidden.
